MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton, affecting properties in Low Waters Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:56am. Our engineers are on their way to the Butterburn substation to investigate a possible blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:15pm on Friday, 05 March 2021
